member.name: D2D1_SIMPLE_COLOR_PROFILE
member.summary: Simple description of a color space.

member.name: D2D1_SIMPLE_COLOR_PROFILE.redPrimary
member.summary: The xy coordinates of the red primary in the CIExyY color space.

member.name: D2D1_SIMPLE_COLOR_PROFILE.greenPrimary
member.summary: The xy coordinates of the green primary in the CIExyY color space.

member.name: D2D1_SIMPLE_COLOR_PROFILE.bluePrimary
member.summary: The xy coordinates of the blue primary in the CIExyY color space.

member.name: D2D1_SIMPLE_COLOR_PROFILE.whitePointXZ
member.summary: The XZ tristimulus values for the whitepoint in the CIEXYZ color space, normalized to luminance (Y) of 1.

member.name: D2D1_SIMPLE_COLOR_PROFILE.gamma
member.summary: The gamma encoding to use for this color space.
